name: TIME (itch) (Justiceau)
description:
This is my entry in to LD50. My first LD!

I am a student learning programming, so most everything in this project is a 'first' for me. It was a fantastic learning experience. Being able to play around with transformations, vectors, and just generally learning the Unity editor.

Credits:
